verses.verse: Let <S%G5360>love<s%> of the <S%G5360>brethren<s%> <S%G3306>continue.<s%>

Do not <S%G1950>neglect<s%> to show <S%G5381>hospitality<s%> to <S%G5381>strangers,<s%> for by <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> have <S%G3579>entertained<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2990>without<s%> <S%G2990>knowing<s%> it.

<S%G3403>Remember<s%> the <S%G1198>prisoners,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> in <S%G4887>prison<s%> with them, and <S%G3588>those<s%> who are ill-treated, <S%G5613>since<s%> you <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> are in the <S%G4983>body.<s%>

[Let] <S%G1062>marriage<s%> [be held] in <S%G5093>honor<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> and let the [marriage] <S%G2845>bed<s%> [be] <S%G283>undefiled;<s%> for <S%G4205>fornicators<s%> and <S%G3432>adulterers<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> will <S%G2919>judge.<s%>

Let your <S%G5158>character<s%> be <S%G866>free<s%> from the <S%G866>love<s%> of <S%G866>money,<s%> being <S%G714>content<s%> with what you <S%G3918>have;<s%> for He <S%G846>Himself<s%> has <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I will <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G447>desert<s%> you, <S%G3761>nor<s%> will I <S%G3756>ever<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1459>forsake<s%> you,"

<S%G5620>so<s%> that we <S%G2292>confidently<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> "The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is my <S%G998>helper,<s%> I will not be <S%G5399>afraid.<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> shall <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> to me?"

<S%G3421>Remember<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2233>led<s%> you, <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to you; and <S%G333>considering<s%> the <S%G1545>result<s%> of their <S%G391>conduct,<s%> <S%G3401>imitate<s%> their <S%G4102>faith.<s%>
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> [is] the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G7088>yesterday<s%> and <S%G4594>today,<s%> [yes] and <S%G165>forever.<s%>

Do not be <S%G3911>carried<s%> <S%G3911>away<s%> by <S%G4164>varied<s%> and <S%G3581>strange<s%> <S%G1322>teachings;<s%> for it is <S%G2570>good<s%> for the <S%G2588>heart<s%> to be <S%G950>strengthened<s%> by <S%G5485>grace,<s%> not by <S%G1033>foods,<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G4043>thus<s%> <S%G4043>occupied<s%> were not <S%G5623>benefited.<s%>

We <S%G2192>have<s%> an <S%G2379>altar,<s%> from <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3000>serve<s%> the <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1849>right<s%> to <S%G2068>eat.<s%>

For the <S%G4983>bodies<s%> of <S%G3778>those<s%> <S%G2226>animals<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> is <S%G1533>brought<s%> into the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G40>place<s%> by the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> [as an offering] for <S%G266>sin,<s%> are <S%G2618>burned<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%> the <S%G3925>camp.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> that He might <S%G37>sanctify<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> His <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%> the <S%G4439>gate.<s%>
<S%G5106>Hence,<s%> let us <S%G1831>go<s%> out to Him <S%G1854>outside<s%> the <S%G3925>camp,<s%> <S%G5342>bearing<s%> His <S%G3680>reproach.<s%>
For <S%G5602>here<s%> we do not <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3306>lasting<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> but we are <S%G1934>seeking<s%> [the city] which is to <S%G3195>come.<s%>

<S%G1223>Through<s%> Him <S%G3767>then,<s%> let us <S%G1223>continually<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G399>offer<s%> up a <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> of <S%G133>praise<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> that is, the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of <S%G5491>lips<s%> that <S%G3670>give<s%> <S%G3670>thanks<s%> to His <S%G3686>name.<s%>
And do not <S%G1950>neglect<s%> <S%G2140>doing<s%> <S%G2140>good<s%> and <S%G2842>sharing;<s%> for with <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2100>pleased.<s%>

<S%G3982>Obey<s%> your <S%G2233>leaders,<s%> and <S%G5226>submit<s%> [to them]; for they <S%G69>keep<s%> <S%G69>watch<s%> <S%G5228>over<s%> your <S%G5590>souls,<s%> as those who will <S%G591>give<s%> an <S%G3056>account.<s%> Let them <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> with <S%G5479>joy<s%> and not with <S%G4727>grief,<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> would be <S%G255>unprofitable<s%> for you.

<S%G4336>Pray<s%> for us, for we are <S%G3982>sure<s%> that we <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> <S%G2309>desiring<s%> to <S%G390>conduct<s%> ourselves <S%G2573>honorably<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things.<s%>
And I <S%G3870>urge<s%> [you] <S%G4053>all<s%> the <S%G4053>more<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> that I may be <S%G600>restored<s%> to you the <S%G5036>sooner.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace,<s%> who <S%G321>brought<s%> up from the <S%G3498>dead<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4166>Shepherd<s%> of the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> [even] <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>

<S%G2675>equip<s%> you in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G18>thing<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> His <S%G2307>will,<s%> <S%G4160>working<s%> in us that <S%G2101>which<s%> is <S%G2101>pleasing<s%> in His <S%G1799>sight,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> [be] the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

But I <S%G3870>urge<s%> you, <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G430>bear<s%> with <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G3874>exhortation,<s%> for I have <S%G1989>written<s%> to you <S%G1223>briefly.<s%> <S%G1024><s%>

<S%G1097>Take<s%> <S%G1097>notice<s%> that our <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> has been <S%G630>released,<s%> with <S%G3739>whom,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G5036>soon,<s%> I shall <S%G3708>see<s%> you.
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> of your <S%G2233>leaders<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints.<s%> <S%G3588>Those<s%> from <S%G2482>Italy<s%> <S%G782>greet<s%> you.
<S%G5485>Grace<s%> be with you <S%G3956>all.<s%>
